components.label: Role
HTML
components.content: Your personal information is collected under 26(c) of the Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act for the purpose of accessing and receiving site remediation services. This information may be made publicly available through the provincial Site Registry. If you have any questions about the collection or sharing of your information, please contact site@gov.bc.ca.

components.html: The BC government is collecting information to determine if applications for contaminated sites services are related to developments that will include housing.
components.label: Text/Images
Is this application related to a housing development project?

components.html:
Personal information is collected by the ministry under the legal authority of section 26 (c) and 27 (1)(a)(i) of the Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act (the Act).  

The collection, use, and disclosure of personal information is subject to the provisions of the Act. The personal information collected by the ministry will be used to process your inquiry or application(s). It may also be shared when strictly necessary with partner agencies that are also subject to the provisions of the Act. The personal information supplied in the application package may be used for referrals or notifications as required. Personal information may be used by the ministry for survey purposes.
components.label: Text/Images
How many housing units will be developed with this housing project?
components.description: Be as specific as possible, or indicate if unknown.

components.label: Does the housing project include a component of any of the following housing categories?

components.html: All applications for contaminated sites services require submission of a Site Risk Classification Report except where exempted under Protocol 12.

I, the undersigned, confirm that the above information is true based on my knowledge as of the date this application form was completed. I understand that fees for contaminated sites services will be collected and/or invoiced as per Schedule 3 of the Contaminated Sites Regulation. I understand the billing contact on this form will be the person with whom the ministry communicates about fees for contaminated sites services.
If this application is not signed by the owner of the property, I declare that I have permission of the owner to submit this application on their behalf.
